examples.description: finds a song instance in @@all by the name property of the song
examples.full_description: Song .find_by_name finds a song instance in @@all by the name property of the song

examples.description: returns (does not recreate) an existing song with the provided name if one exists in @@all
examples.full_description: Song .find_or_create_by_name returns (does not recreate) an existing song with the provided name if one exists in @@all

examples.description: invokes .find_by_name instead of re-coding the same functionality
examples.full_description: Song .find_or_create_by_name invokes .find_by_name instead of re-coding the same functionality

examples.description: creates a song if an existing match is not found
examples.full_description: Song .find_or_create_by_name creates a song if an existing match is not found

examples.description: invokes .create instead of re-coding the same functionality
examples.full_description: Song .find_or_create_by_name invokes .create instead of re-coding the same functionality
